::Killfest::

Killfest feels the gravity increase. He carefully lands on the ground 
to avoid wasting jetpack fuel, and then runs off toward Angel Prime.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Drag Strip::
> Drag Strip gets blinded by the sudden unexpected flash, yells, 
> "Argh, I don't think so Maximal," Still blinded he transforms into 
> robot mode, and fires his gravity gun, creating a gravity field 
which 
> encompasses all of the bots present, increasing the gravity 
greatly, 
> "Now try to get a way!" (this artificial gravity affects all but 
> stunticons)
